text: Ara allaha nija anugrahe taderake ya diyechena tate yara krpanata kare tadera jan'ya ta mangala, emanati yena tara kichute'i mane na kare. Baram ta tadera jan'ya amangala. Yetate tara krpanata karabe keyamatera dina seta'i tadera galaya beri habe [1]. Asamana o yaminera sattbadhikara ekamatra allahâ€Œra'i. Tomara ya kara allaha ta bisesabhabe abahita
